welcome_message_body: Welcome to Angono, Philippines! Immerse yourself in the charm of this artistic town known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Angono has to offer.

restaurants.name: Tamerlane's Ihaw's (Kamayan)
restaurants.description: Tamerlane's Ihaw's (Kamayan) is a bbq joint located in Antipolo City.

restaurants.name: Filio Bistro
restaurants.description: Filio Bistro is a bistro located in the city.

restaurants.name: Gavin's Flame Grilled Burger
restaurants.description: Gavin's Flame Grilled Burger is a burger joint located in Antipolo City.
restaurants.address: Brgy. San Jose (San Jose St.), 1870 Antipolo City, Rizal

restaurants.name: Kamayan Restaurant
restaurants.description: Kamayan Restaurant is a filipino restaurant located in Antipolo City.

restaurants.name: Vieux Chalet
restaurants.description: Vieux Chalet is a swiss restaurant located in Antipolo City.
restaurants.address: Swiss Restaurant (Taktak Road), 1870 Antipolo City, Rizal

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively serving Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, exclusively serving domestic flights for smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connection speed and may require reconnection in certain areas.
